title: Beautiful
text: My husband and I love ruins and couldn’t get enough of this. There are also friendly cats there. Highly recommended.

title: Very good!
text: We had a couple of hours to kill before heading to the airport and decided to go to the museum. They had about 2 floors of exhibits from the Acropolis and ruins beneath the museum which was pretty cool. Also, great view of Acropolis from inside the museum and free WIFI.

title: Athens Walking Tour & transfers
text: They were very quick to respond and were friendly and helpful during our stay. They helped us with a walking tour of Athens (Acropolis) and transfers to and from the airport. They were very nice and the cars were clean and comfortable.

title: Great view!
text: My husband and I only stayed for a night but enjoyed the lovely view of Castello del Moro. Small but cute balcony. Concierge was very helpful. Cute restaurant nearby named Plane. Breakfast was a typical European breakfast. Eggs weren’t very good but food was plentiful. Good for the price and location.

title: Wonderful sunset and food!
text: We loved the volcano hike. My husband and friend enjoyed the swim in thermal springs. The pork was delish and chicken was tasty. We had a good dance as well. Sunset was beautiful!

title: Delish!
text: My husband and I went every day! We’re ice cream fanatics and indulged in 3-4 scoops a day. Yes it was that good! Also, funny sign inside saying Kosta is looking for a wife. He’s a great guy!

title: Fantastic View!
text: My husband and I stayed at the petite suite. Incredible views of Oia, with blue and white domes. The hot tub was very nice as well. The breakfast was enormous a d delicious! With scrambled eggs, yogurt, pancakes, fruits, croissants, chocolate and vanilla pound cake, orange juice, milk, jam, cereal and coffee. We could barely finish. There was a leak on our first day but they were very quick to fix it. My only suggestion is that they rope off your stairs as we had Instagramers wander onto our patio tub area to take pictures. Also, note, the patio is viewable to the public as there is a viewing point above.

title: Breath taking
text: I absolutely loved the Acropolis and personally never grew tired of it. The highlight of our trip! My husband and I love ruins so we thoroughly enjoyed it. I was a fan of all the cats too. Highly recommended!

title: Amazing view and location!
text: We stayed in the room with the Acropolis view and jacuzzi. Our room was at the top floor and was roped off. Can you just say VIP service?!? We never tired of the view and the staff was simply amazing. Aris, out concierge, was so funny too. The breakfast was delicious. We had robes and slippers and daily housekeeping. They are situated in a very charming little street with shops and restaurants in Plaka. We have since departed to Santorini, Heraklion and Chania and still compare everyplace to this. They set the bar high! Perfection!

title: Great stay with our dog!
text: We were greeted like stars every day! The room was clean, beds were very comfy (pillow top?), room was soundproof, which our dog really appreciated during thunderstorms. They provided water, tea and coffee and fruits downstairs. The only thing I wasn't a fan of was the pillows but I have neck issues and brought my own. I would definitely stay here again!

title: Good for the money
text: It was a great price. Room was clean, staff was very helpful and friendly. No true ocean view. Breakfast was good. Pool was very nice. We loved seeing the monkeys from the pool. They also provide drink service by the pool which is a nice touch. AC was rare in the area so we were very happy to have it.

title: Horrible Customer Service
text: I contacted the hotel and Orbitz a few minutes after booking in order to cancel. Orbitz mentioned they would fully refund me if the hotel agreed. The hotel agreed to cancel and mentioned Orbitz would have a fee but they would be happy to cancel. I told Orbitz they agreed. Orbitz reached out to the hotel on several occasions to confirm and they never picked up the phone or returned their messages. I never received a refund.

title: Great hotel near the city
text: Just 5 minutes away from the city center! The bus is right across the street and concierge conveniently sells the tickets for them The staff was extremely helpful. The rooms were comfortable and they even provide WIFi, breakfast, robes and slippers. We had a corner room with a very nice view of the city. Near good restaurants as well.

title: Amazing room and food
text: Our reservation was lost but they upgraded us to a suite for the trouble. All is forgiven!! We had panoramic views of the lake and stayed in the largest hotel room we've ever seen. The room was extremely large and had two rooms along with a terrace. The food included the best lamb and homemade cheesecake we've ever had. The staff was incredibly helpful and friendly. They even spoke English. Quiet, zen like hotel and surrounding. The best stay during our trip, hands down.

title: Great hotel in city center
text: Best Greenlandic food inside 2 of the hotel's restaurants. Great views from inside the restaurants as well. Very well maintained hotel in the city center. Clean and comfortable. WIFI and breakfast offered with Polar rooms.

title: Best Tour for Northern Lights
text: Boy am I glad I booked this tour for the Northern Lights! After tracking the aurora borealis on 2 different apps, I decided on booking with this company due to the vehicle. The jeeps are equipped with the largest wheels I've ever seen, enabling them to go farther and higher than most cars. They took us to the most remote places to get closer to the lights. What we saw that night, was beyond our expectations. The forecast was a 6 and the amazing display of lights took our breath away. Highly recommend!

title: Beautiful landmark
text: Definitely a must for the obligatory landmark photo! Beautiful view of the water and near the Harpa building and harbor.

title: Nice building, pretty views.
text: This is near the harbor and Sun Voyager. Beautiful building, nice views from the inside. Most of the floors were roped off when we visited.
place: Harpa Reykjavik Concert Hall and Conference Centre

title: Excellent service!
text: We were in Nuuk for 3 days and decided to book a tour on the 1st day. All tours were booked, including this one. However, since they knew we were leaving in a couple of days, they were kind enough to book us a private boat fjord tour after their regular business hours. They were so very accommodating and offered life suits to place over our winter gear. They also provided tea to warm us up. This tour was like being inside a painting. The beauty we witnessed was insane.

title: Great service and location
text:
Right across the street from Amtrak and the train station. Near many restaurants as well. Quaint town and good food. The rooms were clean and big. Comfortable beds. Free WIFI and breakfast. We were on the 7th floor and it was quiet.

They provide may towels and toiletries.
place: Embassy Suites by Hilton Alexandria-Old Town

title: Great location, nice room
text: We were close to all the monuments, Capital Hill and the White House. We walked everywhere. The hotel is located in the Financial district so a lot of places are closed on the weekend. Very friendly staff and very nice room. Ask for a room viewing the street if staying on a Thursday night. Otherwise, you will end up waking up in the middle of the night during trash pick up. All other nights are quiet. They do provide ear plugs just in case. Free bike rental and lemon water.

title: Quick visit
text: They have free guided tours. The planetarium was really nice. They also have movies in 3D. Free admission!

title: Best food in town!
text: I happened to stay at a hotel walking distance from this place. Best thing around, apart from monuments, Capital Hill and the White House!
